title: Merry Chrismas GD!
body:
{{champion:267}} Merry Christmas! Love you all <3

Hope you  have a great day, and if you do not celebrate Christmas, I hope you have a great time celebrating whatever it is that you do around this time of year :) And I mean, if you dont celebrate anything, I hope you just have a really great day!

<3 <3 <3

(I might have had some irish cream liquor in my coffee)
